A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have no words for how disappointing this movie was. The plot was boring\, uninspiring and pointless. The storyline doesn’t progress at all. The acting was terrible. The jokes weren’t funny\, and often times just awkward. Overall the movie was insulting to the Star Wars franchise. The only saving grace was the graphics and scenery\, but you’ll still probably leave with a bad taste in your mouth. Save your money.
